A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Brazenly contemptuous of the source material\, old characters are killed off for cheap shock value. And for a movie supposedly made by an SJW he sure doesn't portray females in a flattering way. At every opportunity they are shown to be incompetent\, mindless and dangerous...heck the only strong male bad guy is a dimwit wearing a dress. Possible troll? You decide...Cool effects though
